title: How to get to Sardinia - Airlines and Ferries
text:
Thanks for sharing About.com with others! Most Emailed Articles How to get to Sardinia - Airlines and Ferries Sardinia is accessible from the Italian Mainland by plane or boat 
Traveling to Sardinia by Air 
Sardinia is served by Meridiana, Alitalia, Volare and Air One from the Italian Mainland. Ryanair will get you from London to Alghero's Fertilia airport. 
There are airports in four Sardinian cities: Alghero, Olbia, Arbatax and Cagliari. Italy to Sardinia Ferry Routes
